channel.title: Webapi on Bluish capsule
channel.description: Recent content in Webapi on Bluish capsule

item.title: DatingApp
item.description: DatingApp is a SPA dating application written in Angular 5 with a webapi backend made in C# using .net core 2.1. The application is my opinionated version of this Udemy course The course used a previous version of .net core I fixed everything to use 2.1.0-rc1-final. Preparation Skeleton Securing Client authentication Error handling Upgrading and Debugger Third party components Routing Extending the API Building the UI
